27class Point final : public Zono
28{
29 public:
30
31 // constructor
36 Point() { sharp = true; }
37
43 explicit Point(const Eigen::Vector<zono_float, -1>& c)
44 {
45 set(c);
46 sharp = true;
47 }
48
49 // set method
55 void set(const Eigen::Vector<zono_float, -1>& c);
56
57 HybZono* clone() const override
58 {
59 return new Point(*this);
60 }
61
62 // display methods
63 std::string print() const override;

65 // do nothing methods
66 void remove_redundancy(int) override { /* do nothing */ }

86
87// implementation
88inline void Point::set(const Eigen::Vector<zono_float, -1>& c)
89{
90 // point parameters
91 this->c = c;
92 this->n = static_cast<int>(this->c.size());
93
94 // hybzono parameters
95 this->G.resize(this->n,0);
96 this->nG = 0;
97 this->nGc = this->nG;
98 this->nGb = 0;
99 this->nC = 0;
100 this->Gc = this->G;
101 this->Gb.resize(this->n, 0);
102 this->A.resize(0, this->nG);
103 this->Ac = this->A;
104 this->Ab.resize(0, 0);
105 this->b.resize(0);
106 this->zero_one_form = false;
107}
108
109inline std::string Point::print() const
110{
111 std::stringstream ss;
112 ss << "Point: " << std::endl;
113 ss << "n: " << this->n << std::endl;
114 ss << "c: " << this->c;
115 return ss.str();
116}
117
118inline Eigen::Vector<zono_float, -1> Point::do_optimize_over(
119 const Eigen::SparseMatrix<zono_float>&, const Eigen::Vector<zono_float, -1>&, zono_float,
120 const OptSettings&, OptSolution*) const
121{
122 return this->c;
123}
124
125inline Eigen::Vector<zono_float, -1> Point::do_project_point(const Eigen::Vector<zono_float, -1>& x,
126 const OptSettings&, OptSolution*) const
127{
128 // check dimensions
129 if (this->n != x.size())
130 {
131 throw std::invalid_argument("Point projection: inconsistent dimensions.");
132 }
133
134 return this->c;
135}
136
137inline zono_float Point::do_support(const Eigen::Vector<zono_float, -1>& d,
138 const OptSettings&, OptSolution*)
139{
140 // check dimensions
141 if (this->n != d.size())
142 {
143 throw std::invalid_argument("Support: inconsistent dimensions.");
144 }
145
146 return this->c.dot(d);
147}
148
149inline bool Point::do_contains_point(const Eigen::Vector<zono_float, -1>& x,
150 const OptSettings&, OptSolution*) const
151{
152 if (this->n != x.size())
153 throw std::invalid_argument("Contains point: inconsistent dimensions");
154
155 const zono_float dist = (x - this->c).norm();
156 return dist < zono_eps;
157}
158
159inline Box Point::do_bounding_box(const OptSettings&, OptSolution*)
160{
161 return {this->c, this->c};
162}
163
164} // namespace ZonoOpt
